titlestmt.titleproper: San Rafael de la Zanja Land Grant 1880-1887
San Rafael de la Zanja Land Grant

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: San Rafael de la Zanja Land Grant 1880-1887
did.abstract: Letters, copies of legal documents, maps, and survey notes and other materials chiefly relating to the claims of Alfred A. Green. Includes a map and survey notes by George J. Roskruge; a typescript record book of correspondence and testimony, 1880-1885; survey and map of mines in the area, a copy of by-laws of the San Rafael Cattle Company; and a list of mines on the ranch including mining towns of Harshaw, Mowry, Washington Camp, and La Naria.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: San Rafael de la Zanja Land Grant (AZ 354). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: San Rafael de la Zanja ranch was owned by the San Rafael Cattle Co. The title to the land was challenged by Alfred A. Green.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Letters, copies of legal documents, maps, and survey notes and other materials chiefly relating to the claims of Alfred A. Green. Includes a map and survey notes by George J. Roskruge; a typescript record book of correspondence and testimony, 1880-1885; survey and map of mines in the area, a copy of by-laws of the San Rafael Cattle Company; and a list of mines on the ranch including mining towns of Harshaw, Mowry, Washington Camp, and La Naria.
